author: Fearless & Far
description:
Join our Expeditions & Adventure Retreats https://www.fearlessandfar.com/trips

This a 4-day road trip through the surreal landscapes of Dallol, Ethiopia — one of the most hostile and poisonous places on Earth. From acid pools and toxic gas fields to alien salt formations, this journey takes you deep into the Danakil Depression, where survival is tested and the planet feels truly otherworldly. This is the HOTTEST place on earth.

Join the 18,000+ others subscribed to my Newsletter!
www.fearlessandfar.com/newsletter

title: 72 Hours in the Place Where EVERYTHING Kills You
